mnd6:3.2: **Jīvitan**ti āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ.
mnd6:3.3: Api ca dvīhi kāraṇehi appakaṃ jīvitaṃ thokaṃ jīvitaṃ—
mnd6:3.4: ṭhitiparittatāya vā appakaṃ jīvitaṃ, sarasaparittatāya vā appakaṃ jīvitaṃ.
mnd6:3.6: Atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha, na jīvati na jīvissati;
mnd6:3.7: anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissati, na jīvati na jīvittha;
mnd6:3.8: paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe jīvati, na jīvittha na jīvissati.
mnd6:14.2: Assāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, passāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, assāsapassāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, mahābhūtūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, kabaḷīkārāhārūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, usmūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, viññāṇūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ.
mnd6:14.3: Mūlampi imesaṃ dubbalaṃ, pubbahetūpi imesaṃ dubbalā, ye paccayā tepi dubbalā, yepi pabhāvikā tepi dubbalā, sahabhūpi imesaṃ dubbalā, sampayogāpi imesaṃ dubbalā, sahajāpi imesaṃ dubbalā, yāpi payojikā sāpi dubbalā.
mnd6:14.4: Aññamaññaṃ ime niccadubbalā, aññamaññaṃ anavaṭṭhitā ime.
mnd6:14.5: Aññamaññaṃ paripātayanti ime, aññamaññassa hi natthi tāyitā, na cāpi ṭhapenti aññamaññaṃ ime.
mnd6:17.1: Api ca cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ jīvitaṃ upādāya manussānaṃ appakaṃ jīvitaṃ parittaṃ jīvitaṃ thokaṃ jīvitaṃ khaṇikaṃ jīvitaṃ lahukaṃ jīvitaṃ ittaraṃ jīvitaṃ anaddhanīyaṃ jīvitaṃ naciraṭṭhitikaṃ jīvitaṃ.
mnd6:17.7: brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ jīvitaṃ upādāya manussānaṃ appakaṃ jīvitaṃ parittaṃ jīvitaṃ thokaṃ jīvitaṃ khaṇikaṃ jīvitaṃ lahukaṃ jīvitaṃ ittaraṃ jīvitaṃ anaddhanīyaṃ jīvitaṃ naciraṭṭhitikaṃ jīvitaṃ.
mnd6:17.9: “appamidaṃ, bhikkhave, manussānaṃ āyu, gamaniyo samparāyo, mantāya boddhabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, natthi jātassa amaraṇaṃ.
mnd6:17.10: Yo, bhikkhave, ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo.
mnd6:22.2: Yo vassasataṃ atikkamitvā jīvati so ekaṃ vā vassaṃ jīvati,
mnd6:22.9: tiṃsaṃ vā vassāni jīvati, cattārīsaṃ vā vassāni jīvatīti—
mnd6:22.12: Yadā jiṇṇo hoti vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto khaṇḍadanto palitakeso vilūnaṃ khalitasiro valinaṃ tilakāhatagatto vaṅko bhoggo daṇḍaparāyano, so jarāyapi cavati marati antaradhāyati vippalujjati, natthi maraṇamhā mokkho.
mnd6:32.2: **Janā**ti khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca.
mnd6:32.7: Mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ acchedasaṅkinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti.
mnd6:32.8: Mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkinopi socanti, vipariṇāmantepi socanti, vipariṇatepi socanti kilamanti paridevanti urattāḷiṃ kandanti sammohaṃ āpajjantīti—
mnd6:33.6: Taṇhāpariggaho anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo vipariṇāmadhammo.
mnd6:33.7: Diṭṭhipariggahopi anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo vipariṇāmadhammo.
mnd6:33.9: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, taṃ pariggahaṃ yvāyaṃ pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva tiṭṭheyyā”ti?
mnd6:33.12: Ahampi kho taṃ, bhikkhave, pariggahaṃ na samanupassāmi, yvāyaṃ pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
mnd6:33.13: Pariggahā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti na labbhantīti—
mnd6:34.2: Nānābhāve vinābhāve aññathābhāve sante saṃvijjamāne upalabbhiyamāne.
mnd6:34.6: Nanu etaṃ, ānanda, mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ—
mnd6:34.9: yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ taṃ vata mā palujjī’ti.
mnd6:34.11: Purimānaṃ purimānaṃ khandhānaṃ dhātūnaṃ āyatanānaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā pacchimā pacchimā khandhā ca dhātuyo ca āyatanāni ca pavattantī”ti—
mnd6:35.2: **Itī**ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatā metaṃ.
mnd6:35.3: **Itī**ti iti disvā passitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā mamattesūti—
mnd6:35.5: **Nāgāramāvase**ti sabbaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā puttadārapalibodhaṃ chinditvā ñātipalibodhaṃ chinditvā mittāmaccapalibodhaṃ chinditvā sannidhipalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā eko careyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya pāleyya yapeyya yāpeyyāti—
mnd6:39.2: **Maraṇan**ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhā tamhā sattanikāyā cuti cavanatā bhedo antaradhānaṃ maccumaraṇaṃ kālaṃkiriyā khandhānaṃ bhedo kaḷevarassa nikkhepo jīvitindriyassupacchedo.
mnd6:42.4: **Puriso**ti saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo.
mnd6:42.5: **Mamidanti maññatī**ti taṇhāmaññanāya maññati, diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati, mānamaññanāya maññati, kilesamaññanāya maññati, duccaritamaññanāya maññati, payogamaññanāya maññati, vipākamaññanāya maññatīti—
mnd6:43.2: Etaṃ ādīnavaṃ ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā mamattesūti, etampi viditvā paṇḍito dhīro paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvīti—
mnd6:44.7: So bhagavantaṃ mamāyati, bhagavā taṃ puggalaṃ pariggaṇhāti.
mnd6:44.9: “ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī unnaḷā asamāhitā, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā;
mnd6:44.10: apagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā.
mnd6:44.11: Na ca te imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti.
mnd6:44.12: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū nikkuhā nillapā dhīrā atthaddhā susamāhitā, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā;
mnd6:44.13: anapagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā.
mnd6:44.14: Te ca imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti.
mnd6:47.2: Māmako taṇhāmamattaṃ pahāya diṭṭhimamattaṃ paṭinissajjitvā mamattāya na nameyya na onameyya, na tanninno assa na tappoṇo na tappabbhāro na tadadhimutto na tadadhipateyyoti—
mnd6:51.4: **Paṭibuddho puriso na passatī**ti yathā puriso supinagato candaṃ passati, sūriyaṃ passati, mahāsamuddaṃ passati, sineruṃ pabbatarājānaṃ passati, hatthiṃ passati, assaṃ passati, rathaṃ passati, pattiṃ passati, senābyūhaṃ passati, ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ passati, vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ … bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ … pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakaṃ passati;
mnd6:52.3: **Piyāyitaṃ janan**ti mamāyitaṃ janaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā bhaginiṃ vā puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā mittaṃ vā amaccaṃ vā ñātiṃ vā sālohitaṃ vāti—
mnd6:53.3: Kālaṅkataṃ na passati na dakkhati nādhigacchati na vindati na paṭilabhatīti—
mnd6:57.4: **Te janā**ti khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā cāti—
mnd6:58.2: **Yesan**ti yesaṃ khattiyānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vessānaṃ suddānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ devānaṃ manussānaṃ.
mnd6:58.3: **Nāman**ti saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo.
mnd6:58.4: **Pavuccatī**ti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
mnd6:59.2: Rūpagataṃ vedanāgataṃ saññāgataṃ saṅkhāragataṃ viññāṇagataṃ pahīyati jahīyati vijahīyati antaradhāyati vippalujjati, nāmaṃyevāvasissati.
mnd6:59.8: **Jantuno**ti sattassa narassa mānavassa posassa puggalassa jīvassa jāgussa jantussa indagussa manujassāti—
mnd6:63.2: **Soko**ti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṃ antosoko antoparisoko antodāho antoparidāho cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokasallaṃ.
mnd6:63.4: diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṃ.
mnd6:63.7: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ macchariyaṃ maccharāyanā maccharāyitattaṃ vevicchaṃ kadariyaṃ kaṭukañcukatā aggahitattaṃ cittassa—
mnd6:63.9: Api ca khandhamacchariyampi macchariyaṃ, dhātumacchariyampi macchariyaṃ, āyatanamacchariyampi macchariyaṃ gāho—
mnd6:63.12: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd6:63.17: Mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ acchedasaṅkinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti, mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkinopi socanti, vipariṇāmantepi socanti, vipariṇatepi socanti, mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ acchedasaṅkinopi paridevanti, acchijjantepi paridevanti, acchinnepi paridevanti.
mnd6:63.18: Mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkinopi paridevanti, vipariṇāmantepi paridevanti, vipariṇatepi paridevanti.
mnd6:63.19: Mamāyitaṃ vatthuṃ rakkhanti gopenti pariggaṇhanti mamāyanti maccharāyanti;
mnd6:63.20: mamāyitasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sokaṃ na jahanti, paridevaṃ na jahanti, macchariyaṃ na jahanti, gedhaṃ na jahanti na pajahanti na vinodenti na byantiṃ karonti na anabhāvaṃ gamentīti—
mnd6:64.2: **Tasmā**ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā etaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamānā mamattesūti—
mnd6:64.5: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
mnd6:64.14: Munayo taṇhāpariggahaṃ pariccajitvā diṭṭhipariggahaṃ paṭinissajjitvā cajitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantiṃ karitvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā acariṃsu vihariṃsu iriyiṃsu vattiṃsu pāliṃsu yapiṃsu yāpiṃsu.
mnd6:64.16: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
mnd6:64.17: **Khemadassino**ti khemadassino tāṇadassino leṇadassino saraṇadassino abhayadassino accutadassino amatadassino nibbānadassinoti—
mnd6:64.18: tasmā munayo pariggahaṃ hitvā acariṃsu khemadassino.
mnd6:68.5: Te tato tato cittaṃ patilīnentā patikuṭentā pativaṭṭentā sanniruddhantā sanniggaṇhantā sannivārentā rakkhantā gopentā caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpenti, cakkhudvāre cittaṃ patilīnentā patikuṭentā pativaṭṭentā sanniruddhantā sanniggaṇhantā sannivārentā rakkhantā gopentā caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpenti,
mnd6:68.10: manodvāre cittaṃ patilīnentā patikuṭentā pativaṭṭentā sanniruddhantā sanniggaṇhantā sannivārentā rakkhantā gopentā caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpenti.
mnd6:68.11: Yathā kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativaṭṭati na sampasāriyati;
mnd6:68.12: evamevaṃ tato tato cittaṃ patilīnentā patikuṭentā pativaṭṭentā sanniruddhantā sanniggaṇhantā sannivārentā rakkhantā gopentā caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpenti, cakkhudvāre cittaṃ …
mnd6:68.17: manodvāre cittaṃ patilīnentā patikuṭentā pativaṭṭentā sanniruddhantā sanniggaṇhantā sannivārentā rakkhantā gopentā caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpenti.
mnd6:68.19: **Bhikkhuno**ti puthujjanakalyāṇakassa vā bhikkhuno sekkhassa vā bhikkhunoti—
mnd6:69.2: mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi taṭṭikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāro palālasanthāro.
mnd6:69.3: Taṃ āsanaṃ asappāyarūpadassanena rittaṃ vivittaṃ pavivittaṃ, asappāyasaddassavanena rittaṃ vivittaṃ pavivittaṃ, asappāyagandhaghāyanena … asappāyarasasāyanena … asappāyaphoṭṭhabbaphusanena … asappāyehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi rittaṃ vivittaṃ pavivittaṃ.
mnd6:69.4: Taṃ vivittaṃ āsanaṃ bhajato sambhajato sevato nisevato saṃsevato paṭisevatoti—
mnd6:70.1: **Sāmaggiyamāhu tassa taṃ, yo attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye**ti.
mnd6:70.5: Bahū cepi bhikkhū samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti—
mnd6:70.8: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
mnd6:70.9: Te ekato pakkhandanti pasīdanti sampatiṭṭhanti vimuccanti;
mnd6:70.10: na tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vivādo pavivādo atthi—
mnd6:70.13: Bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti;
mnd6:70.14: na tesaṃ nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā puṇṇattaṃ vā paññāyati—
mnd6:70.16: **Bhavane**ti nerayikānaṃ nirayo bhavanaṃ, tiracchānayonikānaṃ tiracchānayoni bhavanaṃ, pettivisayikānaṃ pettivisayo bhavanaṃ, manussānaṃ manussaloko bhavanaṃ, devānaṃ devaloko bhavananti.
mnd6:70.17: **Sāmaggiyamāhu tassa taṃ, yo attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye**ti.
mnd6:70.18: Tassesā sāmaggī etaṃ channaṃ etaṃ patirūpaṃ etaṃ anucchavikaṃ etaṃ anulomaṃ, yo evaṃ paṭicchanne niraye attānaṃ na dasseyya, tiracchānayoniyaṃ attānaṃ na dasseyya, pettivisaye attānaṃ na dasseyya, manussaloke attānaṃ na dasseyya, devaloke attānaṃ na dasseyyāti evamāhaṃsu evaṃ kathenti evaṃ bhaṇanti evaṃ dīpayanti evaṃ voharantīti—
mnd6:70.19: sāmaggiyamāhu tassa taṃ, yo attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye.
mnd6:74.3: cakkhuñceva rūpā ca, sotañca saddā ca, ghānañca gandhā ca, jivhā ca rasā ca, kāyo ca phoṭṭhabbā ca, mano ca dhammā ca.
mnd6:74.5: Monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.
mnd6:74.11: Muni taṇhānissayaṃ pahāya diṭṭhinissayaṃ paṭinissajjitvā cakkhuṃ anissito sotaṃ anissito ghānaṃ anissito jivhaṃ anissito kāyaṃ anissito manaṃ anissito
mnd6:74.12: rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … dhamme …
mnd6:74.13: kulaṃ … gaṇaṃ … āvāsaṃ … lābhaṃ … yasaṃ … pasaṃsaṃ … sukhaṃ … cīvaraṃ … piṇḍapātaṃ … senāsanaṃ … gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ …
mnd6:74.14: kāmadhātuṃ … rūpadhātuṃ … arūpadhātuṃ … kāmabhavaṃ … rūpabhavaṃ … arūpabhavaṃ … saññābhavaṃ … asaññābhavaṃ … nevasaññānāsaññābhavaṃ …
mnd6:74.17: diṭṭhaṃ … sutaṃ … mutaṃ … viññātaṃ … sabbe dhamme anissito anallīno anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd6:75.5: Idha yassa te honti atthakāmā hitakāmā phāsukāmā yogakkhemakāmā mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā bhaginī vā puttā vā dhītarā vā mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā—
mnd6:75.8: Manāpikā rūpā manāpikā saddā manāpikā gandhā manāpikā rasā manāpikā phoṭṭhabbā—
mnd6:75.13: Idha yassa te honti anatthakāmā ahitakāmā aphāsukāmā ayogakkhemakāmā jīvitā voropetukāmā—
mnd6:75.16: Amanāpikā rūpā amanāpikā saddā amanāpikā gandhā amanāpikā rasā amanāpikā phoṭṭhabbā—
mnd6:75.19: “Ayaṃ me satto piyo, ime ca saṅkhārā manāpā”ti rāgavasena piyaṃ na karoti;
mnd6:75.20: “ayaṃ me satto appiyo, ime ca saṅkhārā amanāpā”ti paṭighavasena appiyaṃ na karoti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—
mnd6:76.1: **Tasmiṃ paridevamaccharaṃ paṇṇe vāri yathā na limpatī**ti.
mnd6:76.3: **Paridevo**ti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṃ.
mnd6:76.6: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ macchariyaṃ maccharāyanā maccharāyitattaṃ vevicchaṃ kadariyaṃ kaṭukañcukatā aggahitattaṃ cittassa—
mnd6:76.8: Api ca khandhamacchariyampi macchariyaṃ, dhātumacchariyampi macchariyaṃ, āyatanamacchariyampi macchariyaṃ gāho—
mnd6:77.4: Yathā vāri padumapattaṃ na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittaṃ apalittaṃ anupalittaṃ, evamevaṃ tasmiṃ puggale arahante khīṇāsave paridevo macchariyañca na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittā apalittā anupalittā.
mnd6:77.5: So ca puggalo arahanto tehi kilesehi na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd6:77.6: tasmiṃ paridevamaccharaṃ paṇṇe vāri yathā na limpati.
mnd6:81.4: Yathā udabindu padumapatte na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittaṃ apalittaṃ anupalittanti—
mnd6:81.9: Yathā vāri padumapupphaṃ na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittaṃ apalittaṃ anupalittanti—
mnd6:82.1: **Evaṃ muni nopalimpati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā**ti.
mnd6:82.9: Muni taṇhālepaṃ pahāya diṭṭhilepaṃ paṭinissajjitvā diṭṭhe na limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, viññāte na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd6:82.10: evaṃ muni nopalimpati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā.
mnd6:86.1: **Dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā**ti.
mnd6:86.3: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
mnd6:86.5: Tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṃ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca,
mnd6:86.8: rāgo dhuto ca dhoto ca sandhoto ca niddhoto ca,
mnd6:86.30: sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca.
mnd6:87.1: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhi dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca,
mnd6:87.2: sammāsaṅkappena micchāsaṅkappo dhuto ca dhoto ca sandhoto ca niddhoto ca,
mnd6:87.10: sammāvimuttiyā micchāvimutti dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca.
mnd6:88.1: Atha vā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sabbe kilesā …
mnd6:88.6: sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca.
mnd6:88.7: Arahā imehi dhonehi dhammehi upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
mnd6:89.1: **Dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā**ti.
mnd6:89.2: Dhono diṭṭhaṃ na maññati, diṭṭhasmiṃ na maññati, diṭṭhato na maññati, diṭṭhā meti na maññati;
mnd6:89.3: sutaṃ na maññati, sutasmiṃ na maññati, sutato na maññati, sutaṃ meti na maññati;
mnd6:89.4: mutaṃ na maññati, mutasmiṃ na maññati, mutato na maññati, mutaṃ meti na maññati;
mnd6:89.5: viññātaṃ na maññati, viññātasmiṃ na maññati, viññātato na maññati, viññātaṃ meti na maññati.
mnd6:89.7: “asmīti, bhikkhave, maññitametaṃ, ayamahamasmīti maññitametaṃ, bhavissanti maññitametaṃ, na bhavissanti maññitametaṃ, rūpī bhavissanti maññitametaṃ, arūpī bhavissanti maññitametaṃ, saññī bhavissanti maññitametaṃ, asaññī bhavissanti maññitametaṃ, nevasaññīnāsaññī bhavissanti maññitametaṃ.
mnd6:89.8: Maññitaṃ, bhikkhave, rogo, maññitaṃ gaṇḍo, maññitaṃ sallaṃ, maññitaṃ upaddavo.
mnd6:89.9: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, amaññamānena cetasā viharissāmāti, evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabban”ti—
mnd6:89.10: dhono na hi tena maññati yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā.
mnd6:90.2: Dhono aññena asuddhimaggena micchāpaṭipadāya aniyyānikapathena aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi aññatra sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra bojjhaṅgehi aññatra ariyā aṭṭhaṅgikā maggā suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti—
mnd6:91.2: Sabbe bālaputhujjanā rajjanti, puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ upādāya satta sekkhā virajjanti;
mnd6:91.4: Viratto so khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā, khayā dosassa vītadosattā, khayā mohassa vītamohattā.
mnd6:91.5: So vuṭṭhavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
mnd6:91.6: na hi so rajjati no virajjati.
mnd6:93.4: Na hi so rajjati no virajjatī”ti.
